name: 2D Shooter (Final)
description:
Final version of the CAS 117 2D shooter project.

Modifications:

- Added power-up that doubles damage for ten seconds. These will slowly spawn endlessly from the left wall, and drift right at a random angle.

- Added a lives counter in the top right corner.

- Added an endless mode, where the goal is simply to get as many points as possible before you game over.

- Filled out the Instructions page on the main menu to include info about the player's ship, the enemies, and the power-up.

Credits:

Original assets and tutorials - Brian Winn and Declan McClintock

Created and modified by Nova Tolmoff

Power-up sprites made in Aseprite.
